g.text: Serve users from nearby data centers
Improve SEO by reducing bounce rates
Fault tolerance during outages or spikes
Hidden costs like per-GB data transfer fees
Costly and time-consuming to switch providers
Blocked IP addresses in certain regions
Data privacy risks with third-party storage
SDK generates tokens for secure access
Handles SSL termination, auth, rate limiting, logging
Tracks storage locations, file details, health statuses
Query metadata for optimal storage host
Encryption at rest using secrets management
Fingerprinting files prevents stale cache issues
Track upload states, CDN misses, request rates
